The constructor will initializes the property of the new instance using and .

.method public static hidebysig class Java.Nio.LongBuffer Allocate(int32 capacity) cil managed

Docs.param: the capacity of the new buffer.
Docs.summary: Creates a long buffer based on a newly allocated long array.

remarks.para: Creates a long buffer based on a newly allocated long array.

Docs.exception: if capacity is less than zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public override sealed int ArrayOffset ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 ArrayOffset() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the offset into the array returned by array of the first element of the buffer (optional operation).

remarks.para: Returns the offset into the array returned by array of the first element of the buffer (optional operation). The backing array (if there is one) is not necessarily the same size as the buffer, and position 0 in the buffer is not necessarily the 0th element in the array. Use buffer.array()[offset + buffer.arrayOffset() to access element offset in buffer.
Use hasArray to ensure this method won't throw. (A separate call to isReadOnly is not necessary.)

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract Java.Nio.LongBuffer AsReadOnlyBuffer ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Nio.LongBuffer AsReadOnlyBuffer() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a read-only buffer that shares its content with this buffer.

remarks.para: Returns a read-only buffer that shares its content with this buffer.
The returned buffer is guaranteed to be a new instance, even if this buffer is read-only itself. The new buffer's position, limit, capacity and mark are the same as this buffer's.
The new buffer shares its content with this buffer, which means this buffer's change of content will be visible to the new buffer. The two buffer's position, limit and mark are independent.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract Java.Nio.LongBuffer Compact ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Nio.LongBuffer Compact() cil managed

Docs.summary: Compacts this long buffer.

remarks.para: Compacts this long buffer.
The remaining longs will be moved to the head of the buffer, staring from position zero. Then the position is set to remaining(); the limit is set to capacity; the mark is cleared.

Docs.exception: if no changes may be made to the contents of this buffer.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int CompareTo (Java.Nio.LongBuffer otherBuffer);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 CompareTo(class Java.Nio.LongBuffer otherBuffer) cil managed

Docs.param: another long buffer.
Docs.summary: Compare the remaining longs of this buffer to another long buffer's remaining longs.

remarks.para: Compare the remaining longs of this buffer to another long buffer's remaining longs.

Docs.exception: if otherBuffer is not a long buffer.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract Java.Nio.LongBuffer Duplicate ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Nio.LongBuffer Duplicate() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a duplicated buffer that shares its content with this buffer.

remarks.para: Returns a duplicated buffer that shares its content with this buffer.
The duplicated buffer's position, limit, capacity and mark are the same as this buffer. The duplicated buffer's read-only property and byte order are same as this buffer's, too.
The new buffer shares its content with this buffer, which means either buffer's change of content will be visible to the other. The two buffers' position, limit and mark are independent.

Docs.param: the index, must not be negative and less than limit.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Java.Nio.LongBuffer Get (long[] dst);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Nio.LongBuffer Get(int64[] dst) cil managed

Docs.param: the destination long array.
Docs.summary: Reads longs from the current position into the specified long array and increases the position by the number of longs read.

remarks.para: Reads longs from the current position into the specified long array and increases the position by the number of longs read.
Calling this method has the same effect as get(dst, 0, dst.length).

Docs.exception: if dst.length is greater than remaining().

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Java.Nio.LongBuffer Get (long[] dst, int dstOffset, int longCount);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Nio.LongBuffer Get(int64[] dst, int32 dstOffset, int32 longCount) cil managed

Docs.param: the target long array.
the offset of the long array, must not be negative and not greater than dst.length.
the number of longs to read, must be no less than zero and not greater than dst.length - dstOffset.
Docs.summary: Reads longs from the current position into the specified long array, starting from the specified offset, and increase the position by the number of longs read.

remarks.para: Reads longs from the current position into the specified long array, starting from the specified offset, and increase the position by the number of longs read.

Docs.exception: if either dstOffset or longCount is invalid.
if longCount is greater than remaining().

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool HasArray { get; }
.property instance bool HasArray

Docs.summary: Returns true if array and arrayOffset won't throw.

remarks.para: Returns true if array and arrayOffset won't throw. This method does not return true for buffers not backed by arrays because the other methods would throw UnsupportedOperationException, nor does it return true for buffers backed by read-only arrays, because the other methods would throw ReadOnlyBufferException.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract Java.Nio.ByteOrder Order ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Nio.ByteOrder Order() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the byte order used by this buffer when converting longs from/to bytes.

remarks.para: Returns the byte order used by this buffer when converting longs from/to bytes.
If this buffer is not based on a byte buffer, then always return the platform's native byte order.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Java.Nio.LongBuffer Put (Java.Nio.LongBuffer src);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Nio.LongBuffer Put(class Java.Nio.LongBuffer src) cil managed

Docs.param: the source long buffer.
Docs.summary: Writes all the remaining longs of the src long buffer to this buffer's current position, and increases both buffers' position by the number of longs copied.

remarks.para: Writes all the remaining longs of the src long buffer to this buffer's current position, and increases both buffers' position by the number of longs copied.

Docs.exception: if src.remaining() is greater than this buffer's remaining().
if src is this buffer.
if no changes may be made to the contents of this buffer.

Docs.exception: if position is equal or greater than limit.
if no changes may be made to the contents of this buffer.

MemberSignature.Value: public Java.Nio.LongBuffer Put (long[] src);
.method public hidebysig instance class Java.Nio.LongBuffer Put(int64[] src) cil managed

Docs.param: the source long array.
Docs.summary: Writes longs from the given long array to the current position and increases the position by the number of longs written.

remarks.para: Writes longs from the given long array to the current position and increases the position by the number of longs written.
Calling this method has the same effect as put(src, 0, src.length).

Docs.exception: if remaining() is less than src.length.
if no changes may be made to the contents of this buffer.

Docs.exception: if remaining() is less than longCount.
if either srcOffset or longCount is invalid.
if no changes may be made to the contents of this buffer.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract Java.Nio.LongBuffer Slice ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Nio.LongBuffer Slice() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a sliced buffer that shares its content with this buffer.

remarks.para: Returns a sliced buffer that shares its content with this buffer.

The sliced buffer's capacity will be this buffer's remaining(), and its zero position will correspond to this buffer's current position. The new buffer's position will be 0, limit will be its capacity, and its mark is cleared. The new buffer's read-only property and byte order are same as this buffer's.
The new buffer shares its content with this buffer, which means either buffer's change of content will be visible to the other. The two buffers' position, limit and mark are independent.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override IntPtr ThresholdClass { get; }
.property instance native int ThresholdClass

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which contains the java.lang.Class JNI value corresponding to this type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control which jclass is provided to methods like .

MemberSignature.Value: protected override Type ThresholdType { get; }
.property instance class System.Type ThresholdType

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Java.Nio.LongBuffer Wrap (long[] array);
.method public static hidebysig class Java.Nio.LongBuffer Wrap(int64[] array) cil managed

Docs.param: the long array which the new buffer will be based on.
Docs.summary: Creates a new long buffer by wrapping the given long array.

remarks.para: Creates a new long buffer by wrapping the given long array.
Calling this method has the same effect as wrap(array, 0, array.length).

MemberSignature.Value: public static Java.Nio.LongBuffer Wrap (long[] array, int start, int longCount);
.method public static hidebysig class Java.Nio.LongBuffer Wrap(int64[] array, int32 start, int32 longCount) cil managed

Docs.param: the long array which the new buffer will be based on.
the start index, must not be negative and not greater than array.length.
the length, must not be negative and not greater than array.length - start.
Docs.summary: Creates a new long buffer by wrapping the given long array.

remarks.para: Creates a new long buffer by wrapping the given long array.
The new buffer's position will be start, limit will be start + longCount, capacity will be the length of the array.

Docs.exception: if either start or longCount is invalid.
